author: A New Level Media
name: day-off-color-theme
description: This is a remix of the popular Brogrammer theme first discovered and used in Sublime Text. Enjoy!

scripts.lint:commit: echo 'NOTE :: Run `check-for-leaks && lint-staged` once I figure out their output issues' && exit 0
scripts.circ:check: echo '=====[ Running the `CIRC:CHECK` script... ]====='; madge --circular --exclude '.output' --extensions js,jsx,ts,tsx,vue .
scripts.secrets:check: echo '=====[ Running the `SECRETS:CHECK` script... ]====='; ggshield secret scan path . --recursive --yes
scripts.test: echo '=====[ Running the `TEST` script... ]====='; vitest run
